thoughts.text: The 'get_hyperlinks' command can be used to retrieve hyperlinks from any of the search results returned by the 'google' command. Let's use this command to retrieve hyperlinks from the first search result and see if there are any new updates or events happening in the Subway Surfers game.
thoughts.reasoning: We used the 'google' command to search for any new updates or events happening in the Subway Surfers game. Now we can use the 'get_hyperlinks' command to retrieve hyperlinks from the first search result and see if there are any new updates or events happening in the game.
thoughts.plan: - Use the 'get_hyperlinks' command to retrieve hyperlinks from the first search result returned by the 'google' command and see if there are any new updates or events happening in the Subway Surfers game
thoughts.criticism: There is a risk of getting sidetracked or spending too much time browsing the hyperlinks, so we should be mindful of our time and responsibilities.
